title: Kenya Census
text:
Data downloaded on February 3, 2026
Surveys have been performed from Jan 14 2026 until Jan 14 2026 .


clean %>%
  tbl_summary(
    include = geo_community,
    statistic = all_categorical() ~ "{n}",
    missing = "no",
    label = list(geo_community ~ "Community")
  ) %>%
  modify_footnote(everything() ~ NA)





  
    
    
      Characteristic
      N = 1,321
    
  
  
    Community

207

206
        Minyalala

        Ndibai

        Ulu
